title: T019 [US1]: Run fresh clone test
description:
## Task Details

Clone repository to /tmp, verify only main branch exists, tests pass, then clean up.

## Acceptance Criteria

* Fresh clone succeeds
* Only main branch visible
* Tests pass 100%

## User Story

US1: Clean Git History Establishment (Priority: P1)

## Phase

Phase 2: Post-Push Verification

## Related Spec

[spec.md](./spec.md) | [plan.md](./plan.md) | [tasks.md](./tasks.md)

## Commands

```bash
# Clone to temp location
git clone https://github.com/Obsidian-Owl/floe-runtime.git /tmp/floe-test
cd /tmp/floe-test

# Verify only main branch
git branch -r

# Verify tests pass
make test

# Clean up
cd /Users/dmccarthy/Projects/floe-runtime
rm -rf /tmp/floe-test
```

title: [Polish] Security audit: verify no hardcoded credentials
description:
**Task ID**: T079
**Phase**: Polish & Cross-Cutting Concerns

Security audit to verify no hardcoded credentials and all secrets use SecretStr.

**Verification Steps**:

1. Run `rg "password|secret|api_key|token" --type py plugins/floe-catalog-polaris/`
2. Verify all credential fields use SecretStr
3. Check no credentials in test files (use env vars)
4. Run bandit security scanner
5. Verify no secrets logged in any code path

**Checklist**:

- [ ] All password fields use SecretStr
- [ ] All API keys use SecretStr
- [ ] No hardcoded values in tests
- [ ] No credentials in log statements
- [ ] Environment variable fallbacks have safe defaults

**Acceptance Criteria**:

* bandit scan passes with no high/critical issues
* All secrets properly protected
* No credentials in git history

**Labels**: \[P\] parallelizable

title: [US6] Use list_namespaces() as lightweight health probe
description:
**Task ID**: T068
**User Story**: US6 - Platform Operator Monitors Catalog Health
**File**: `plugins/floe-catalog-polaris/src/floe_catalog_polaris/plugin.py`

Use list_namespaces() as the lightweight health probe operation.

**Rationale**:

* list_namespaces() is fast and always available
* Tests catalog connectivity and authentication
* Minimal load on catalog service

**Implementation Details**:

* Call self.\_catalog.list_namespaces() with timeout
* Catch all exceptions and convert to unhealthy status

**Acceptance Criteria**:

* Probe completes quickly (< 1 second typical)
* Works even with empty catalog
